wobani.component.light.blinnphong

Class BlinnPhongLightSourceTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongLightSourceTile

  • public class BlinnPhongLightSourceTile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a tile of the world and manages the positional lights placed in this tile of the world both in CPU and VGA side.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long lastActive
      The last time when lights filled more than half of the SSBO's capacity.
      private java.util.List<BlinnPhongPositionalLightComponent> lights
      The tile's positional light sources in the SSBO.
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOG
      The class's logger.
      private boolean refreshAllLights
      Signs that all light sources in the tile need to refresh for exmaple because the SSBO's size changed.
      private int slotCount
      Number of light slots used in the SSBO.
      private Ssbo ssbo
      The SSBO which contains the tile's light sources in the VGA side.
      private org.joml.Vector2i tileCenter
      The tile's center position.

      • setLastActiveToNow

        private void setLastActiveToNow()
        Signs that the lights fill more than half of the SSBO's capacity and don't have to shrink the SSBO in the near future.

      • refreshState

        public void refreshState()
        Tries to optimize the tile's SSBO. If more than half of the SSBO is empty or even the whole SSBO is empty since a time, it'll shrink or even release the SSBO.
        See Also:
        BlinnPhongLightSources.setActionTimeLimit(long)

      • shrinkOrReleaseSsboIfNeeded

        private void shrinkOrReleaseSsboIfNeeded(long elapsedTimeSinceMoreThanHalfCapacity)
        Tries to optimize the tile's SSBO. If more than half of the SSBO is empty or even the whole SSBO is empty at a time, it'll shrink or even release the SSBO.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTimeSinceMoreThanHalfCapacity - elapsed time since the SSBO was filled more than half of it's capacity

      • computeNumberOfLightsInTheTile

        private int computeNumberOfLightsInTheTile()
        Computes the number of the light sources stored in this tile.
        Returns:
        the number of light sources stored in this tile

      • shrinkSsbo

        private void shrinkSsbo()
        Replaces the lights into the first half of the SSBO's memory and than shrinks the SSBO to half memory size.

      • placeLightToLowerIndex

        private void placeLightToLowerIndex(@NotNull
                                    BlinnPhongPositionalLightComponent light)
        Tries to replace the given light to a lower index in the SSBO.
        Parameters:
        light - positional light source

      • computeFirstEmptySlot

        private int computeFirstEmptySlot()
        Computes the SSBO's first empty light slot in the first half of the SSBO's memory. It returns -1 if all the SSBO's first half memory is filled with light sources.
        Returns:
        the SSBO's first empty light slot in the first half of the SSBO's memory
